entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Carmacks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:08 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.1°C

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
